data.text:
@TinaNgataPublic @XTOTL 'Richie McCaw's team heli-evacuated off Godzone course'

https://t.co/ZIM5siF9yW
@TinaNgataPublic @XTOTL After my Mum and Dad I know now and tell all whanu everyon I know this
@TinaNgataPublic @XTOTL Yip and dont leave them by themselves. Someone needs to be with them the whole time. Cant trust it (Im saying “it” my first instinct was to day “them” 😬)
@Cioccolata234 @TinaNgataPublic @XTOTL This has happened to my elderly mum, I took her into hospital, she needed to be there.

@MrsVickers7 @XTOTL I was on the phone to the CEO of the DHB and the chief medical officer while this was happening. Our CMO was able to get the surgeon to confirm she needed to come down to ED and for ED to be prepared for her.
@agujitayuppi @stevestales @changko @TinaNgataPublic @XTOTL I assume it varies - depends if it's accident, urgent medical, patient transfer.
